title: Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - Lover - Long-Lasting Matte Lip Color - 5ml
description: Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick in Lover delivers bold, vibrant color with a long-lasting matte finish. Launched in 2017, this liquid lipstick features a unique arrow applicator for precise application and a 16-hour wear formula. Its non-drying texture ensures comfort while providing high-impact color. Perfect for creating striking, long-lasting lip looks for any occasion, this lipstick is a must-have for your makeup routine.
key_features: Vibrant color payoff with a unique arrow applicator
Comfortable, non-drying formula for all-day wear
Bold, striking shade ideal for any occasion
